description: Navigation constructors for menus, breadcrumbs, tabs, pagination and sidebars

sprouts.name: sprout-nav-scrollable
sprouts.description: Scrollable navigation container with snap scrolling

sprouts.name: sprout-breadcrumbs
sprouts.description: Breadcrumb navigation with separators and hover effects

sprouts.name: sprout-nav-menu
sprouts.description: Navigation menu with horizontal or vertical orientation

sprouts.name: sprout-nav-dropdown
sprouts.description: Dropdown navigation menu with toggle and animated menu

sprouts.name: sprout-nav-tabs
sprouts.description: Tab navigation with active state indicators

sprouts.name: sprout-nav-sidebar
sprouts.description: Fixed sidebar navigation with header, content and footer sections
